best.why: This version provides the strongest intellectual scaffolding for the movement. By contextualizing AI within the history of production (Gutenberg, Photography), it elevates Slopism from a mere reaction to a necessary evolution of art. It perfectly identifies the core economic shift: the scarcity of judgment in an era of infinite generation.

worst.why: It presents the conflict but offers no synthesis or solution. It functions more as a slogan than an opening manifesto section, lacking the vital pivot toward using judgment as a tool.

must_survive_line: The cost of making has collapsed to zero. The cost of choosing well has not.
